info.title: Km4city Web App API
info.description:
This API allows users to go directly to perform the functions in the web app without interacting with the app interface.

A comprehensive set of sample API calls follows:

*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=discovercity](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=discovercity)

*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aboutus](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aboutus)
*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/events/?range=week&lang=it&maxResults=100](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/events/?range=week&lang=it&maxResults=100)
*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=privatetransport&lang=fra](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=privatetransport&lang=fra)
*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=health&lang=deu](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=health&lang=deu)
*  [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou&lang=eng](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou&lang=eng)

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description:
The operation to be performed.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=discovercity](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=discovercity)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/accomodation](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/accomodation)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/agricultureandlivestock](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/agricultureandlivestock)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/advertising](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou/advertising)

parameters.name: coordinates
parameters.description:
It overrides the position possibly provided by the GPS sensor. The expected value of this parameter is a WGS84 latitude followed by a semicolon and a WGS84 longitude.

  Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=discovercity](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=discovercity)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/accomodation](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/accomodation)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/accommodation](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/accommodation)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/agricultureandlivestock](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/agricultureandlivestock)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/advertising](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/advertising)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/culturalactivity](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/culturalactivity)
  * [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/educationandresearch](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.720953;10.409746&operation=aroundyou/educationandresearch)

parameters.name: serviceuri
parameters.description:
Show details of a service URI.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [http://www.km4city.org/webapp/?serviceuri=Bus_ataflinea_Stop_FM0017_5](http://www.km4city.org/webapp/?serviceuri=Bus_ataflinea_Stop_FM0017_5)
* [http://www.km4city.org/webapp/?serviceUri=http://www.disit.org/km4city/resource/Bus_ataflinea_Stop_FM0017_5](http://www.km4city.org/webapp/?serviceUri=http://www.disit.org/km4city/resource/Bus_ataflinea_Stop_FM0017_5)

parameters.name: geoJsonUri
parameters.description:
Get a GeoJson passed as URL and draw it on the map.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/events/?range=week&lang=it&maxResults=100](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/events/?range=week&lang=it&maxResults=100)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description:
Change the language of the interface. Possible values (ita, eng, fra, deu, esp).

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=privatetransport&lang=fra](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=privatetransport&lang=fra)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=health&lang=deu](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=health&lang=deu)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou&lang=eng](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=aroundyou&lang=eng)

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description:
These values are entered as the destination point and the route is calculated using the values entered in the coordinates parameter as the starting point. The expected value of this parameter is a WGS84 latitude followed by a semicolon and a WGS84 longitude. Only used in the _pathfinder_. operations.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.533860;11.568589&routeType=foot_shortest](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.533860;11.568589&routeType=foot_shortest)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.7711;11.2713&coordinates=43.795;11.2652&routeType=public_transport](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.7711;11.2713&coordinates=43.795;11.2652&routeType=public_transport)

parameters.name: routeType
parameters.description:
Only used in the _pathfinder_.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.533860;11.568589&routeType=foot_shortest](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.720953;10.409746&coordinates=43.533860;11.568589&routeType=foot_shortest)
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.7711;11.2713&coordinates=43.795;11.2652&routeType=public_transport](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?operation=pathfinder&destination=43.7711;11.2713&coordinates=43.795;11.2652&routeType=public_transport)

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description:
Maximum distance from the GPS position of the services to be retrieved, expressed in Km (0.1 is used if parameter is missing). Only used in _search_ operations.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.80953;11.25&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering&maxDistance=2&maxResults=50](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.80953;11.25&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering&maxDistance=2&maxResults=50)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
Maximum number of results to be returned. If parameter is missing 100 is assumed, if it is 0 all results are returned. Only used in _search_ operations.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.80953;11.25&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering&maxDistance=2&maxResults=50](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?coordinates=43.80953;11.25&operation=aroundyou/civilandedilengineering&maxDistance=2&maxResults=50)

parameters.name: bodyFontSize
parameters.description:
The size of the text in the HTML body, in pixels.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse)

parameters.name: scaleFactorIcons
parameters.description:
A multiplier for the size of markers of services on the map.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse)

parameters.name: bottomMenu
parameters.description:
If set to _true_, the listing of found services is anchored to the bottom side of the screen, regardless of the screen orientation.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&bottomMenu=true&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&bottomMenu=true&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse)

parameters.name: rightMenu
parameters.description:
If set to true, the listing of found services is anchored to the right side of the screen, regardless of the screen orientation.

Sample API calls where this parameter is submitted follow:
* [https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&rightMenu=true&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse](https://www.km4city.org/webapp/?scaleFactorIcons=3&bodyFontSize=25&rightMenu=true&geoJsonUri=http://servicemap.km4city.org/WebAppGrafo/api/v1/?selection=43.7991694;11.2393286%26categories%3DService%26maxResults%3D50%26maxDists%3D0.1%26format%3Djson%26lang%3Dit%26fullCount%3Dfalse)

200.description: An appropriately populated service map, possibly including appropriate components for allowing user input.

text/html.example:
Loading…

      Survey
      - -
      API
      Rec
      Sens
      Photo
      Pers
